sentences.cn: 大部分人都没受过教育的劳动力

sentences.en: A word, phrase, or manner of expression used chiefly by uneducated people.
sentences.cn: 主要是没受过教育的人用的词汇 、 短语或表达方式.

sentences.en: Educated persons prefer to live around educated rather than uneducated neighbors.
sentences.cn: 受过教育的人乐于和受过教育的人而不乐于和未受教育的人比邻而居.

sentences.en: Even though I am uneducated. I know that you are my everything.
sentences.cn: 哪怕我不学无术.也知道你是我的全部.

sentences.en: He is so uneducated that he can scarcely write his name.
sentences.cn: 他未受什么教育,甚至不大会写自己的名字.

sentences.en: He was put down as an uneducated man.
sentences.cn: 他被看作是没受过教育的人.

sentences.en: How many white children have gone uneducated?
sentences.cn: 有多少白人孩子未能接受教育?

sentences.en: If a son is uneducated, his dad is to blame.
sentences.cn: “子不教, 父之过”如何翻译?

sentences.en: It is the uneducated vulgarity of expression at all.
sentences.cn: 这纯粹是未受教育者的一种粗俗说法.

sentences.en: Of course, he's a quite uneducated man.
sentences.cn: 显然, 他极其缺乏教养.

sentences.en: The educated and uneducated people have to a large extent the difference.
sentences.cn: 受过教育与未受过教育的人有很大程度上的区别.

sentences.en: The people are uneducated and rude.
sentences.cn: 那些人没受过教育,而且态度粗鲁.

sentences.en: The uneducated are more to be pitied than blamed.
sentences.cn: 无知比犯错更值得同情.

sentences.en: To the uneducated, an A is just three sticks.
sentences.cn: 对于没读过书的来说, A就是三根木棍.

sentences.en: You can tell from his gross language that the man was uneducated.
sentences.cn: 从他那粗俗的语言可以看出,这个人没受过教育.

trans.tran_cn: 未受良好教育的，缺乏教养的，未受过正规教育的，没上过学的
trans.tran_en: not educated to the usual level, or showing that someone is not well educated
